meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2414.

td.p: Deborah Sager, a senior from Reston, Virginia
Matt Zielenski, a junior from Broadview Heights, Ohio
Susannah Batko-Yovino, a junior from Altoona, Pennsylvania

tr.td: JAPAN
TV PERSONALITIES
THE 1970s
NUTRITION
SHAKESPEARE
COMMON BONDS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Susannah: What is Mount Fiji?)
(Alex: Yes.)
[Voices from offstage.]
(Alex: No, sorry.)
---
(Alex: [looking offstage] I thought that\'s what Susannah said, but she did not.)

Mt. Fuji

SusannahMatt
')
